title.narrative: Strengthening cooperatives in Quang Nam - ECODIT phase 1

description.narrative:
This grant is directed towards the ecologically and economically sustainable establishment and growth of cooperatives’ businesses in key commodities in the USAID Green Annamites Project areas, and, in the future replicability of the intervention. For this, the grant will ensure the managerial, governance and technical capacities of the coops and technical capacity of their farmer members. Together – and focusing on replicability – QNCA (and Hue Cooperative Alliance (HCA)) will acquire the capacities for further rolling out of similar initiatives. Furthermore government will also be aligned and will experience the necessary enabling environment for cooperative development according to international standards. Project 8052 is for the inception phase of the project: assessments of cooperatives and value chains in the area; analysis of stakeholders and potential business partners; defining the workplan together with ECODIT and AGriterra team; and capacity building plan for QNCA. This grant builds upon the Quang Nam Cooperative Development Plan developed by Agriterra, QNCA, DGRV and the PPC, for which an MoU was signed in March 2018. Furthermore, based on initial field analysis in 2017-18, a blended approach is proposed by working with existing cooperatives, setting up new cooperatives and strengthening QNCA and HCA to achieve the needed outcomes and impact resulting from the project in Quang Nam and Hue province. For Hue province the focus will be mainly on capacitating the Hue Cooperative Alliance and support a small group of forestry associations into cooperatives. In the course of the project the potential in Hue province for upscaling and providing technical assistance in cooperative building needs to be assessed with the ECODIT project team.
